alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 17 at 8:08PM CDT until July 19 at 12:38PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. For the Tennesse-Tombigbee River ...including Tibbee, Stennis Lock & Dam, Columbus, Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Water surrounds sewage lagoon west of Macon; however, access road is not blocked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 32.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 15.8 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Noxubee River Macon 28.0 32.2 Mon 7 pm CDT 27.9 23.4 20.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
